      • findPlayer

        public Player findPlayer(java.lang.String username)
                  throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        This will be called after a player completes their turn. The main data will then be changed on the server so it is equal to the player's turn

      • syncBoard

        public void syncBoard()
        This will be called to ensure that the Game grabs all the updated info from the server.
        Pre:Condition
        initialize has to have been called before this, but once the Poller grabs a new model from the server, it will call this.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        this is called at the very start of the game to initialize the singleton and create all the classes needed to function.
